about.title: About Jennifer
about.bio: With over 10 years of experience in the beauty industry, Jennifer Gallardo is dedicated to helping you feel confident and beautiful. From bridal makeup to relaxing treatments, every service is tailored to bring out your natural radiance.

services.title: Our Services
services.makeup_bride_desc: Timeless and elegant makeup for your special day
services.makeup_quince_desc: Glamorous makeup for your milestone celebration
services.makeup_photo_desc: Camera-ready makeup that captures your best angle
services.waxing_desc: Smooth, flawless skin with precision waxing
services.lash_desc: Curling and tinting for stunning, defined lashes
services.massage_desc: Therapeutic massage to relieve stress and tension

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.review1: Jennifer made me feel so beautiful on my wedding day. Her makeup was perfect!
testimonials.review2: The best beauty experience ever. Jennifer is a true professional.
testimonials.review3: I always come back. She knows exactly what works for me.
